item.title: Hello World
item.description: Introduction to myself Hi! I am Rodrigo Cardoso Moreira a software developer since 2004, I’ve born in 1985, so I am developer for a good part of my time. I thought that now it’s the rigth time to start to share some of my experiences and also learn during this process. I would like to advice that the content of this blogs are related must on my point of view and also my understanding of the read of great authors I will probably use on my posts as reference.
